resources.string:
Login successfull!

You don't need to open this activity anymore.

You can finish this activity and upload photos or videos from the Share context menu (Share->AndroidCPG) at any standard Android application as the Android Gallery or Android File Explorer.

When you choose Share->AndroidCPG, the AndroidCPG's upload file(s) activity will appear will be started, and then you will be able to create new album, select the album and upload the file(s).
